SELECT t.*, y.category_name, ut.`name` as unit_name, d.brand_name, e.discount_rate, se.store_name, e.retail_price, e.wholesale_price, e.membership_price FROM gr_product t LEFT JOIN (SELECT de.* from gr_product_barcode de,gr_unit ut WHERE de.unit_id = ut.id and ut.type = 0 ) e ON t.id = e.product_id AND e.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_contactunits r ON t.default_contactunits_id = r.id AND r.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_brand d ON t.brand_id = d.id AND d.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_product_category y ON y.id = t.category_id AND y.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_unit ut ON ut.id = t.unit_id AND ut.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_store se ON se.id = t.default_store_id AND se.deleted = 0 WHERE t.deleted = 0
and (t.number like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or t.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or e.barcode like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or t.specs like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or r.contactunits_name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or d.brand_name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') )
and t.category_id IN
#{id}
